一般现在时.title: 一般现在时
一般现在时.definition: 表示经常性、习惯性的动作或状态，也用于表示客观事实、真理和现在的状态。
一般现在时.structure: 主语 + 动词原形（第三人称单数加-s/-es）
usage: 表示经常性或习惯性动作：I get up at 6 every day.
表示客观事实或真理：The earth goes around the sun.
表示现在的状态或特征：She looks beautiful.
在时间/条件状语从句中表将来：If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home.

mistakes.wrong: He go to school every day.
mistakes.correct: He goes to school every day.
mistakes.explanation: 第三人称单数主语后，动词要加-s或-es

mistakes.wrong: She don't like apples.
mistakes.correct: She doesn't like apples.
mistakes.explanation: 第三人称单数的否定用doesn't，不用don't

examples: I usually have breakfast at 7:00.
She speaks English very well.
Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius.

一般过去时.title: 一般过去时
一般过去时.definition: 表示过去某一时间发生的动作或存在的状态，也表示过去经常或反复发生的动作。
一般过去时.structure: 主语 + 动词过去式（be动词用was/were）
usage: 表示过去发生的动作：I visited my grandma yesterday.
表示过去存在的状态：He was a teacher ten years ago.
表示过去的习惯：When I was young, I often played football.

mistakes.wrong: I go to Beijing last year.
mistakes.correct: I went to Beijing last year.
mistakes.explanation: 有过去时间标志词（last year），动词要用过去式

mistakes.wrong: Did you went there?
mistakes.correct: Did you go there?
mistakes.explanation: did后面的动词要用原形

examples: She bought a new dress yesterday.
They were happy at the party.
I didn't watch TV last night.

一般将来时.title: 一般将来时
一般将来时.definition: 表示将来某一时刻将要发生的动作或存在的状态，也表示将来经常或反复发生的动作。
一般将来时.structure: 主语 + will/shall + 动词原形 或 主语 + be going to + 动词原形
usage: will表示临时决定或预测：I will help you.
be going to表示计划或有迹象要发生：Look at the clouds. It's going to rain.
shall用于第一人称的提议：Shall we go now?

mistakes.wrong: I will going to school.
mistakes.correct: I will go to school.
mistakes.explanation: will后面直接加动词原形，不加to或-ing

mistakes.wrong: She is go to leave.
mistakes.correct: She is going to leave.
mistakes.explanation: be going to结构中，be动词后接going

examples: We will have a meeting tomorrow.
I'm going to visit my uncle next week.
It will be sunny this afternoon.

现在进行时.title: 现在进行时
现在进行时.definition: 表示现在正在进行的动作，也可表示现阶段正在进行或即将发生的动作。
usage: 表示说话时正在进行的动作：He is reading a book now.
表示现阶段正在进行的动作：She is learning French this year.
表示即将发生的动作（常用go, come, leave等）：I am leaving tomorrow.
与always连用表示赞扬或不满：He is always helping others.

mistakes.wrong: She is play the piano.
mistakes.correct: She is playing the piano.
mistakes.explanation: be动词后面要用动词的-ing形式

mistakes.wrong: I am knowing the answer.
mistakes.correct: I know the answer.
mistakes.explanation: know是状态动词，一般不用进行时

examples: They are watching TV at the moment.
Look! The baby is crying.
We are having an English class now.

过去进行时.title: 过去进行时
过去进行时.definition: 表示过去某一时刻或某段时间正在进行的动作。
usage: 表示过去某时正在进行的动作：I was sleeping at 9 last night.
描述故事背景：The sun was shining and the birds were singing.
与when/while连用：I was doing homework when mom came back.

mistakes.wrong: I was watch TV at 8 yesterday.
mistakes.correct: I was watching TV at 8 yesterday.
mistakes.explanation: was/were后要用动词-ing形式

mistakes.wrong: While I did homework, he was playing.
mistakes.correct: While I was doing homework, he was playing.
mistakes.explanation: while引导的从句常用进行时

examples: She was cooking when the phone rang.
What were you doing at this time yesterday?
They were playing basketball at 4 p.m.

现在完成时.title: 现在完成时
现在完成时.definition: 表示过去发生的动作对现在造成的影响或结果，也表示从过去持续到现在的动作或状态。
现在完成时.structure: 主语 + have/has + 过去分词
usage: 表示过去的动作对现在的影响：I have lost my key. (现在没有钥匙)
表示经历：Have you ever been to Beijing?
表示持续到现在的状态：I have lived here for 10 years.
常与already, yet, just, ever, never, for, since连用

mistakes.wrong: I have see the movie.
mistakes.correct: I have seen the movie.
mistakes.explanation: have/has后面要用动词的过去分词形式

mistakes.wrong: I have bought this book yesterday.
mistakes.correct: I bought this book yesterday.
mistakes.explanation: 有具体过去时间（yesterday），不能用现在完成时

mistakes.wrong: He has gone to Beijing for 3 days.
mistakes.correct: He has been in Beijing for 3 days.
mistakes.explanation: have gone表示去了还没回来，不能与for连用

examples: She has already finished her homework.
I have never met him before.
We have known each other since 2020.

过去完成时.title: 过去完成时
过去完成时.definition: 表示在过去某一时间或动作之前已经完成的动作，即'过去的过去'。
过去完成时.structure: 主语 + had + 过去分词
usage: 表示过去某时之前完成的动作：By the time I arrived, he had left.
在宾语从句中表示更早的过去：He said he had seen the film.
常与by, before, after, when等连用

mistakes.wrong: After he had left, I arrived.
mistakes.correct: After he left, I arrived.
mistakes.explanation: after/before引导的从句中，过去完成时可省略

mistakes.wrong: I had finished homework yesterday.
mistakes.correct: I finished homework yesterday.
mistakes.explanation: 没有'过去的过去'参照，用一般过去时

examples: When I got home, my parents had already had dinner.
She said she had never been abroad.
I had learned 1000 words before I entered middle school.

被动语态.title: 被动语态
被动语态.definition: 当主语是动作的承受者时，使用被动语态。强调动作的承受者或动作本身。
被动语态.structure: 主语 + be + 过去分词 + (by + 动作执行者)
usage: 不知道或不必说明动作执行者：The window was broken.
强调动作承受者：The book was written by Lu Xun.
客观报道或正式场合：The meeting will be held tomorrow.
各种时态的被动：is done, was done, will be done, has been done等

mistakes.wrong: The car was repair yesterday.
mistakes.correct: The car was repaired yesterday.
mistakes.explanation: be后面要用动词的过去分词

mistakes.wrong: The book is belonged to me.
mistakes.correct: The book belongs to me.
mistakes.explanation: belong是不及物动词，没有被动语态

examples: English is spoken all over the world.
The bridge was built in 1990.
The work must be finished on time.

不定式.title: 不定式 (to + 动词原形)
不定式.definition: 由to + 动词原形构成的非谓语动词形式，可以作主语、宾语、表语、定语、状语和宾语补足语。
usage: 作宾语：I want to go home. / I decide to study hard.
作目的状语：I came here to see you.
作主语：To learn English well is important. = It is important to learn English well.
作宾语补足语：My mother asked me to clean the room.
作定语：I have something to tell you.

mistakes.wrong: I want go home.
mistakes.correct: I want to go home.
mistakes.explanation: want后接不定式，必须有to

mistakes.wrong: He made me to cry.
mistakes.correct: He made me cry.
mistakes.explanation: make/let/have等使役动词后用省略to的不定式

mistakes.wrong: I saw him to run.
mistakes.correct: I saw him run/running.
mistakes.explanation: 感官动词see/hear/watch后用省略to的不定式或-ing

examples: She decided to become a doctor.
It's kind of you to help me.
I don't know what to do.

动名词.title: 动名词 (v.-ing作名词)
动名词.definition: 由动词-ing形式构成，具有名词性质，可以作主语、宾语、表语等。
usage: 作主语：Swimming is good for health.
作宾语：I enjoy reading books. / Thank you for helping me.
作表语：My hobby is collecting stamps.
某些动词后只能接动名词：enjoy, finish, mind, practice, avoid, consider等

mistakes.wrong: I enjoy to swim.
mistakes.correct: I enjoy swimming.
mistakes.explanation: enjoy后只能接动名词，不能接不定式

mistakes.wrong: Thank you for help me.
mistakes.correct: Thank you for helping me.
mistakes.explanation: 介词后要用动名词

examples: Reading makes a full man.
Would you mind opening the window?
She is good at playing the piano.

现在分词.title: 现在分词 (v.-ing作形容词/副词)
现在分词.definition: 由动词-ing形式构成，可以作定语、状语、表语和宾语补足语，表示主动或正在进行。
usage: 作定语（表主动/进行）：the sleeping baby = the baby who is sleeping
作状语：Hearing the news, she jumped with joy.
作表语：The movie is exciting.
作宾语补足语：I saw him running.

mistakes.wrong: The news is excited.
mistakes.correct: The news is exciting.
mistakes.explanation: 修饰物用-ing（令人...的），修饰人用-ed（感到...的）

mistakes.wrong: Seen from the hill, we can see the whole city.
mistakes.correct: Seeing from the hill, we can see the whole city.
mistakes.explanation: 分词的逻辑主语要与句子主语一致

examples: Look at the running water.
The story is very interesting.
Walking along the street, I met an old friend.

过去分词.title: 过去分词 (v.-ed作形容词)
过去分词.definition: 由动词过去分词形式构成，可以作定语、状语、表语和宾语补足语，表示被动或完成。
过去分词.structure: 动词过去分词 (规则动词加-ed，不规则动词需记忆)
usage: 作定语（表被动/完成）：the broken window = the window which was broken
作表语：I am interested in English.
作宾语补足语：I found the door locked.
作状语：Seen from the top, the city looks beautiful.

mistakes.wrong: I am very interesting in music.
mistakes.correct: I am very interested in music.
mistakes.explanation: 人作主语时用-ed形式表示感受

mistakes.wrong: I am boring.
mistakes.correct: I am bored.
mistakes.explanation: bored表示'感到无聊的'，boring表示'令人无聊的'

examples: The excited children opened their presents.
I feel tired after the long walk.
Written in English, the book is hard to understand.

宾语从句.title: 宾语从句
宾语从句.definition: 在复合句中作宾语的从句，通常放在主句谓语动词、介词或形容词之后。
宾语从句.structure: 主句 + 引导词(that/wh-/if/whether) + 陈述语序
usage: that引导（可省略）：I think (that) he is right.
wh-词引导：I don't know what his name is.
if/whether引导：I wonder if/whether he will come.
注意宾语从句要用陈述语序

mistakes.wrong: I don't know where is he.
mistakes.correct: I don't know where he is.
mistakes.explanation: 宾语从句要用陈述语序，不用疑问语序

mistakes.wrong: He asked me that where I lived.
mistakes.correct: He asked me where I lived.
mistakes.explanation: 特殊疑问词引导时不需要that

mistakes.wrong: I wonder if will he come.
mistakes.correct: I wonder if he will come.
mistakes.explanation: if引导的宾语从句要用陈述语序

examples: I believe that you can do it.
Could you tell me how I can get to the station?
I'm not sure whether it will rain tomorrow.

定语从句.title: 定语从句
定语从句.definition: 在复合句中修饰名词或代词的从句，通常紧跟在被修饰的词（先行词）之后。
定语从句.structure: 先行词 + 关系词(who/which/that/whose/where/when) + 从句
usage: who/that指人：The man who/that is talking is my father.
which/that指物：The book which/that I bought is interesting.
whose表所属：The girl whose mother is a doctor is my friend.
where指地点：This is the school where I studied.
when指时间：I still remember the day when I met you.

mistakes.wrong: The man which is talking is my teacher.
mistakes.correct: The man who/that is talking is my teacher.
mistakes.explanation: 先行词是人时，用who或that，不用which

mistakes.wrong: The book who I bought is good.
mistakes.correct: The book which/that I bought is good.
mistakes.explanation: 先行词是物时，用which或that，不用who

mistakes.wrong: This is the place where I visited.
mistakes.correct: This is the place which/that I visited.
mistakes.explanation: visit是及物动词，需要宾语，用which/that而非where

examples: I have a friend who can speak five languages.
The movie that we saw last night was exciting.
I'll never forget the day when I graduated.

状语从句.title: 状语从句
状语从句.definition: 在复合句中作状语的从句，用来修饰主句，表示时间、条件、原因、目的、结果、让步等。
状语从句.structure: 连词 + 从句，主句（从句可前可后）
usage: 时间状语从句：when, while, before, after, as soon as, until等
条件状语从句：if, unless (= if not)
原因状语从句：because, since, as
让步状语从句：although/though, even if/though
结果状语从句：so...that..., such...that...

mistakes.wrong: If it will rain tomorrow, I will stay at home.
mistakes.correct: If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home.
mistakes.explanation: 在条件状语从句中，用一般现在时表将来

mistakes.wrong: Although he is tired, but he keeps working.
mistakes.correct: Although he is tired, he keeps working.
mistakes.explanation: although和but不能同时使用

mistakes.wrong: Because I was ill, so I didn't go to school.
mistakes.correct: Because I was ill, I didn't go to school.
mistakes.explanation: because和so不能同时使用

examples: I will call you as soon as I arrive.
Unless you work hard, you won't succeed.
He was so tired that he fell asleep immediately.

比较级.title: 形容词/副词比较级
比较级.definition: 用于两者之间的比较，表示'更...'的意思。
比较级.structure: 形容词/副词比较级 + than / more + 形容词/副词原级 + than
usage: 单音节和部分双音节词：加-er（tall→taller, big→bigger）
多音节和部分双音节词：more + 原级（beautiful→more beautiful）
不规则变化：good/well→better, bad/badly→worse, many/much→more
比较级的修饰词：much, a lot, even, still, a little

mistakes.wrong: She is more taller than me.
mistakes.correct: She is taller than me.
mistakes.explanation: tall是单音节词，用-er形式，不需要more

mistakes.wrong: He runs more fast than me.
mistakes.correct: He runs faster than me.
mistakes.explanation: fast的比较级是faster，不是more fast

mistakes.wrong: This book is more better.
mistakes.correct: This book is better / much better.
mistakes.explanation: good的比较级是better，不能用more修饰

examples: My sister is two years older than me.
This question is more difficult than that one.
He works much harder than before.

最高级.title: 形容词/副词最高级
最高级.definition: 用于三者或三者以上的比较，表示'最...'的意思。
最高级.structure: the + 形容词/副词最高级 + (in/of范围)
usage: 单音节和部分双音节词：加-est（tall→tallest, big→biggest）
多音节和部分双音节词：most + 原级（beautiful→most beautiful）
不规则变化：good/well→best, bad/badly→worst, many/much→most
常与in+地点/of+范围连用

mistakes.wrong: He is tallest in our class.
mistakes.correct: He is the tallest in our class.
mistakes.explanation: 形容词最高级前要加the

mistakes.wrong: She is the most youngest.
mistakes.correct: She is the youngest.
mistakes.explanation: young是单音节词，最高级是youngest，不用most

mistakes.wrong: This is the best book of all the book.
mistakes.correct: This is the best book of all the books.
mistakes.explanation: of all后面的名词要用复数

examples: He is the tallest student in our class.
This is the most interesting book I have ever read.
She sings (the) best of all the students.

感叹句.title: 感叹句
感叹句.definition: 用来表达强烈感情的句子，句末用感叹号。常用What和How引导。
感叹句.structure: What + (a/an) + 形容词 + 名词 + 主语 + 谓语! / How + 形容词/副词 + 主语 + 谓语!
usage: What + a/an + 形容词 + 可数名词单数：What a beautiful girl she is!
What + 形容词 + 不可数名词/复数名词：What nice weather! What beautiful flowers!
How + 形容词/副词：How beautiful the girl is! How fast he runs!
判断用What还是How：看中心词是名词还是形容词/副词

mistakes.wrong: What beautiful girl she is!
mistakes.correct: What a beautiful girl she is!
mistakes.explanation: 可数名词单数前要加a/an

mistakes.wrong: How a beautiful girl!
mistakes.correct: What a beautiful girl! / How beautiful the girl is!
mistakes.explanation: How后直接加形容词，不加冠词和名词

mistakes.wrong: What nice the weather is!
mistakes.correct: How nice the weather is! / What nice weather!
mistakes.explanation: What后要有名词，How后直接加形容词

examples: What an interesting story it is!
What delicious food!
How time flies!

祈使句.title: 祈使句
祈使句.definition: 用来表示请求、命令、建议、劝告等的句子，通常省略主语you。
祈使句.structure: 动词原形 + 其他 / Don't + 动词原形 + 其他 / Let + 宾语 + 动词原形
usage: 肯定祈使句：Open the door, please.
否定祈使句：Don't be late. / Never give up.
Let句型：Let me help you. / Let's go.
反义疑问句：Open the door, will you? / Let's go, shall we?

mistakes.wrong: Don't to be noisy.
mistakes.correct: Don't be noisy.
mistakes.explanation: Don't后直接加动词原形，不需要to

mistakes.wrong: Please you come here.
mistakes.correct: Please come here.
mistakes.explanation: 祈使句通常省略主语you

mistakes.wrong: Let's go, will we?
mistakes.correct: Let's go, shall we?
mistakes.explanation: Let's的反义疑问句用shall we

examples: Be quiet, please.
Don't touch it!
Let him do it himself.

一般疑问句.title: 一般疑问句
一般疑问句.definition: 用yes或no回答的疑问句，通常将助动词、be动词或情态动词放在主语前。
一般疑问句.structure: 助动词/Be动词/情态动词 + 主语 + 动词(原形) + 其他?
usage: be动词开头：Are you a student? — Yes, I am. / No, I'm not.
助动词开头：Do you like English? — Yes, I do. / No, I don't.
情态动词开头：Can you swim? — Yes, I can. / No, I can't.
回答要与问句保持一致

mistakes.wrong: Does he likes music?
mistakes.correct: Does he like music?
mistakes.explanation: does后面动词要用原形

mistakes.wrong: Are you a teacher? — Yes, you are.
mistakes.correct: Are you a teacher? — Yes, I am.
mistakes.explanation: 回答时主语要变换，you变I

mistakes.wrong: Do you can swim?
mistakes.correct: Can you swim?
mistakes.explanation: 情态动词can不能与do连用

examples: Is she your sister? — Yes, she is.
Did you finish your homework? — No, I didn't.
Will it rain tomorrow? — Maybe.

特殊疑问句.title: 特殊疑问句
特殊疑问句.definition: 用特殊疑问词（what, who, where, when, why, how等）提问的句子，不能用yes或no回答。
特殊疑问句.structure: 特殊疑问词 + 一般疑问句语序（疑问词作主语时除外）
usage: what问什么：What is your name?
who问谁：Who is that man? / Who(m) did you see?
where问地点：Where do you live?
when问时间：When did you arrive?
why问原因：Why are you late?
how问方式/程度：How do you go to school? / How old are you?

mistakes.wrong: What you want?
mistakes.correct: What do you want?
mistakes.explanation: 特殊疑问句需要助动词（疑问词作主语时除外）

mistakes.wrong: Who did break the window?
mistakes.correct: Who broke the window?
mistakes.explanation: who作主语时，不需要助动词did

mistakes.wrong: How many book do you have?
mistakes.correct: How many books do you have?
mistakes.explanation: how many后面要用可数名词复数

examples: What time does the movie start?
Who teaches you English?
How often do you exercise?

There be句型.title: There be句型
There be句型.definition: 表示'某处存在某人或某物'的句型，be动词的形式由后面最近的名词决定（就近原则）。
There be句型.structure: There + be(is/are/was/were) + 主语 + 地点/时间状语
usage: 表示存在：There is a book on the desk.
就近原则：There is a pen and two books on the desk.
各种时态：There will be / There has been / There used to be
否定和疑问：There isn't... / Is there...?

mistakes.wrong: There have a book on the desk.
mistakes.correct: There is a book on the desk.
mistakes.explanation: There be结构用be动词，不用have

mistakes.wrong: There are a pen and two books.
mistakes.correct: There is a pen and two books.
mistakes.explanation: 就近原则：be动词由最近的名词a pen决定

mistakes.wrong: There has a lot of water.
mistakes.correct: There is a lot of water.
mistakes.explanation: water是不可数名词，用is

examples: There are many students in the classroom.
Is there a hospital near here?
There will be a meeting tomorrow.

情态动词.title: 情态动词
情态动词.definition: 表示说话人的语气或态度的动词，后接动词原形，没有人称和数的变化。
情态动词.structure: 主语 + 情态动词 + 动词原形
usage: can/could 表能力、许可、可能：I can swim. / Could you help me?
may/might 表许可、可能：May I come in? / It may rain.
must 表必须、肯定推测：You must finish it. / He must be at home.
should 表应该、建议：You should study hard.
need 表需要（否定needn't）：You needn't worry.

mistakes.wrong: He can swims.
mistakes.correct: He can swim.
mistakes.explanation: 情态动词后接动词原形，不加-s

mistakes.wrong: Must I finish it? — No, you mustn't.
mistakes.correct: Must I finish it? — No, you needn't/don't have to.
mistakes.explanation: must的否定回答用needn't或don't have to，mustn't表禁止

mistakes.wrong: He must be not at home.
mistakes.correct: He can't be at home.
mistakes.explanation: must be的否定是can't be，不是must not be

examples: Can you speak Japanese?
You must hand in your homework on time.
You should be more careful.

主谓一致.title: 主谓一致
主谓一致.definition: 句子的主语和谓语动词在人称和数上要保持一致。
主谓一致.structure: 单数主语 + 单数谓语 / 复数主语 + 复数谓语
usage: 就近原则：There is/are..., Either...or..., Neither...nor..., Not only...but also...
就远原则：主语 + with/as well as/together with/except/besides + 名词
不可数名词作主语，谓语用单数：Water is important.
动名词/不定式作主语，谓语用单数：Swimming is good for health.
集体名词：family, class, team等看作整体用单数，看作成员用复数

mistakes.wrong: The teacher with his students are in the classroom.
mistakes.correct: The teacher with his students is in the classroom.
mistakes.explanation: with引导的部分不是主语，主语是teacher，谓语用单数

mistakes.wrong: Neither you nor he are right.
mistakes.correct: Neither you nor he is right.
mistakes.explanation: neither...nor...就近原则，he是单数，用is

mistakes.wrong: Maths are my favorite subject.
mistakes.correct: Maths is my favorite subject.
mistakes.explanation: 学科名词（maths, physics, news等）虽以s结尾，但作单数

examples: Everyone is here.
Not only he but also I am a student.
The police are looking for the thief.

冠词用法.title: 冠词 (a/an/the)
冠词用法.definition: 用在名词前，说明名词所指的人或事物。分为不定冠词(a/an)、定冠词(the)和零冠词。
usage: a/an用于泛指单数可数名词：a book, an apple (元音音素前用an)
the用于特指、上文提过、独一无二的事物：the sun, the book I bought
the + 形容词表示一类人：the rich (富人), the young (年轻人)
零冠词：复数名词和不可数名词泛指、球类运动、三餐、学科等

mistakes.wrong: I have a umbrella.
mistakes.correct: I have an umbrella.
mistakes.explanation: umbrella以元音音素开头，用an

mistakes.wrong: He is an university student.
mistakes.correct: He is a university student.
mistakes.explanation: university虽以u开头，但发音是辅音/ju:/，用a

mistakes.wrong: I like playing the football.
mistakes.correct: I like playing football.
mistakes.explanation: 球类运动前不加冠词

examples: I saw a dog. The dog was very cute.
The moon goes around the earth.
We should help the poor.

名词所有格.title: 名词所有格
名词所有格.definition: 表示名词之间的所属关系，主要有's所有格和of所有格两种形式。
usage: 's所有格：用于有生命的名词，如 Tom's book, my mother's room
of所有格：用于无生命的名词，如 the door of the room, the name of the book
双重所有格：a friend of my father's (我父亲的一个朋友)
特殊用法：表时间、距离、国家等：today's newspaper, ten minutes' walk

mistakes.wrong: This is my father's friend's book.
mistakes.correct: This is a book of my father's friend.
mistakes.explanation: 避免连续使用's，可改用of结构

mistakes.wrong: Toms' book
mistakes.correct: Tom's book
mistakes.explanation: 单数名词直接加's

mistakes.wrong: The door's color
mistakes.correct: The color of the door
mistakes.explanation: 无生命名词一般用of所有格

examples: This is my sister's room.
The legs of the table are broken.
She is a friend of mine.

代词.title: 代词 (人称/物主/反身/指示)
代词.definition: 用来代替名词或名词短语的词，包括人称代词、物主代词、反身代词、指示代词等。
代词.structure: 根据在句中的成分选择相应形式
usage: 人称代词主格（作主语）：I, you, he, she, it, we, they
人称代词宾格（作宾语）：me, you, him, her, it, us, them
形容词性物主代词（后接名词）：my, your, his, her, its, our, their
名词性物主代词（独立使用）：mine, yours, his, hers, its, ours, theirs
反身代词：myself, yourself, himself, herself, itself, ourselves, themselves

mistakes.wrong: Me and Tom are friends.
mistakes.correct: Tom and I are friends.
mistakes.explanation: 作主语用主格I，且把自己放后面

mistakes.wrong: This is her, not my.
mistakes.correct: This is hers, not mine.
mistakes.explanation: 独立使用时用名词性物主代词

mistakes.wrong: He hurt hisself.
mistakes.correct: He hurt himself.
mistakes.explanation: 反身代词是himself，不是hisself

examples: She gave me a book.
This is my book. That is yours.
He taught himself English.

介词.title: 常用介词
介词.definition: 用在名词、代词或动名词前，表示时间、地点、方式、原因等关系的词。
介词.structure: 介词 + 名词/代词/动名词
usage: 时间：at+时刻, on+具体日期, in+年月季节长时段
地点：at+小地点, in+大地点/里面, on+表面
方式：by+交通工具/方式, with+工具/材料, in+语言/颜色
常见搭配：be good at, be interested in, look for, wait for, listen to

mistakes.wrong: I arrived at Beijing.
mistakes.correct: I arrived in Beijing.
mistakes.explanation: arrive in+大地点，arrive at+小地点

mistakes.wrong: I go to school by a bus.
mistakes.correct: I go to school by bus.
mistakes.explanation: by+交通工具中间不加冠词

mistakes.wrong: I'm looking forward to see you.
mistakes.correct: I'm looking forward to seeing you.
mistakes.explanation: look forward to后面接动名词

examples: The meeting will be held at 3 o'clock on Monday.
She goes to work by subway.
He is good at playing basketball.

it用法.title: it的用法
it用法.definition: it可以指代前面提到的事物，也可以作形式主语、形式宾语，还可用于强调句、时间、天气等表达。
it用法.structure: It + be + adj. + to do / It + be + adj. + that从句
usage: 指代：I have a dog. It is very cute.
形式主语：It is important to learn English. = To learn English is important.
形式宾语：I find it difficult to learn English.
表天气/时间/距离：It is sunny today. / It is 8 o'clock. / It is 5 km from here.
强调句：It is Tom that/who broke the window.

mistakes.wrong: Is important to study hard.
mistakes.correct: It is important to study hard.
mistakes.explanation: 不定式作主语时，常用it作形式主语

mistakes.wrong: I think it easy learn English.
mistakes.correct: I think it easy to learn English.
mistakes.explanation: 形式宾语it后面要有真正的宾语to learn English

mistakes.wrong: I found that difficult to finish.
mistakes.correct: I found it difficult to finish.
mistakes.explanation: find it + adj. + to do结构中用it，不用that

examples: It's nice to meet you.
I think it necessary to have a rest.
It was yesterday that I met her.

反义疑问句.title: 反义疑问句
反义疑问句.definition: 在陈述句后加一个简短的疑问句，用来确认陈述句的内容。遵循'前肯后否、前否后肯'原则。
反义疑问句.structure: 陈述句, + 助动词/be动词/情态动词 + 主语(代词)?
usage: 前肯后否：You are a student, aren't you?
前否后肯：He can't swim, can he?
特殊情况：Let's go, shall we? / Let us go, will you?
祈使句：Open the door, will you? / Don't be late, will you?

mistakes.wrong: He is a teacher, is he?
mistakes.correct: He is a teacher, isn't he?
mistakes.explanation: 前肯后否：前面是肯定，后面用否定

mistakes.wrong: You have finished, don't you?
mistakes.correct: You have finished, haven't you?
mistakes.explanation: have作助动词时，反问部分也用have

mistakes.wrong: There is a book, isn't there a book?
mistakes.correct: There is a book, isn't there?
mistakes.explanation: 反问部分只需要简短形式

examples: She likes music, doesn't she?
You won't be late, will you?
Let's have a rest, shall we?

so/neither倒装.title: so/neither引导的倒装句
so/neither倒装.definition: 表示'某人也是'或'某人也不是'时，用so/neither引导的倒装句。
so/neither倒装.structure: So + 助动词/be动词/情态动词 + 主语（表肯定）/ Neither/Nor + 助动词/be动词/情态动词 + 主语（表否定）
usage: 肯定：I like English. — So do I. (我也喜欢)
否定：I can't swim. — Neither/Nor can I. (我也不会)
注意：So + 主语 + 助动词表示'确实如此'，不是倒装
时态要与前句一致

mistakes.wrong: I like music. — So like I.
mistakes.correct: I like music. — So do I.
mistakes.explanation: So后要用助动词，不是直接用动词

mistakes.wrong: He is a student. — So I am.
mistakes.correct: He is a student. — So am I.
mistakes.explanation: So引导的倒装句，主语在后面

mistakes.wrong: I don't like it. — So do I.
mistakes.correct: I don't like it. — Neither do I.
mistakes.explanation: 前句是否定，后面用Neither，不用So

examples: Tom is tall. — So is Jack.
I have been to Beijing. — So have I.
She doesn't eat meat. — Neither does her sister.

词汇辨析_say_tell_speak_talk.title: say/tell/speak/talk辨析
词汇辨析_say_tell_speak_talk.definition: 四个表示'说'的动词用法不同：say强调说的内容，tell强调告诉某人，speak强调说某种语言，talk强调交谈。
词汇辨析_say_tell_speak_talk.structure: say sth. / tell sb. sth. / speak + 语言 / talk to/with sb. about sth.
usage: say：强调说的内容，say sth., say to sb.
tell：告诉某人，tell sb. sth., tell sb. to do sth., tell a story/lie/joke
speak：说某种语言，演讲，speak English, speak to sb.
talk：交谈，talk to/with sb., talk about sth.

mistakes.wrong: He said me the news.
mistakes.correct: He told me the news.
mistakes.explanation: tell后可直接接双宾语，say不可以

mistakes.wrong: Can you tell English?
mistakes.correct: Can you speak English?
mistakes.explanation: 说某种语言用speak

mistakes.wrong: I want to say with you.
mistakes.correct: I want to talk with you.
mistakes.explanation: 与某人交谈用talk with

examples: He said nothing about it.
Please tell me your name.
She can speak three languages.
They are talking about the movie.

词汇辨析_spend_take_cost_pay.title: spend/take/cost/pay辨析
词汇辨析_spend_take_cost_pay.definition: 四个表示'花费'的词用法不同：spend主语是人，take常用It作主语，cost主语是物，pay主语是人且用于付款。
词汇辨析_spend_take_cost_pay.structure: sb. spend time/money (in) doing / on sth. | It takes sb. time to do sth. | sth. cost sb. money | sb. pay money for sth.
usage: spend：人作主语，spend time/money (in) doing sth. / on sth.
take：It作形式主语，It takes sb. time to do sth.
cost：物作主语，sth. cost sb. money
pay：人作主语，sb. pay money for sth.

mistakes.wrong: I spent two hours to finish it.
mistakes.correct: I spent two hours finishing it.
mistakes.explanation: spend time doing sth.，不用to do

mistakes.wrong: The book takes me 50 yuan.
mistakes.correct: The book cost me 50 yuan.
mistakes.explanation: 花钱买东西用cost，take用于花时间

mistakes.wrong: I costed 100 yuan for the book.
mistakes.correct: I paid 100 yuan for the book.
mistakes.explanation: 人作主语花钱用pay

examples: I spent an hour doing my homework.
It took me two hours to finish the work.
This dress cost me 200 yuan.
I paid 50 dollars for this shirt.

词汇辨析_borrow_lend_keep.title: borrow/lend/keep辨析
词汇辨析_borrow_lend_keep.definition: 三个表示'借'的词方向不同：borrow是借入，lend是借出，keep是保留/借用多久。
词汇辨析_borrow_lend_keep.structure: borrow sth. from sb. | lend sth. to sb. / lend sb. sth. | keep sth. for + 时间段
usage: borrow：借入，从别人那里借来，borrow sth. from sb.
lend：借出，把东西借给别人，lend sth. to sb. / lend sb. sth.
keep：保留，与时间段连用表示借了多久，keep sth. for + 时间段

mistakes.wrong: Can you borrow me your pen?
mistakes.correct: Can you lend me your pen?
mistakes.explanation: 借给别人用lend，不用borrow

mistakes.wrong: I have borrowed the book for two weeks.
mistakes.correct: I have kept the book for two weeks.
mistakes.explanation: borrow是瞬间动词，不能与时间段连用，用keep

mistakes.wrong: He lent a book from the library.
mistakes.correct: He borrowed a book from the library.
mistakes.explanation: 从某处借入用borrow from

examples: May I borrow your dictionary?
He lent me 100 yuan.
You can keep the book for a month.
